Interface Time

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimeImpl

    public interface Time
    A service that provides a universal Time.
    Author:
    syl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long dayLength() 
      long dayTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • dayTime

        long dayTime()
        Returns:
        how much time spent since the beginning of this day, on an arbitrary scale (cf. dayLength()).

      • dayLength

        long dayLength()
        Returns:
        the (constant) length of a day.
